links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1).
formula: G.f.: (1 - x^2)/(1 - x - x^3).a(n+3) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n-k, floor(k/2)). - _Paul Barry_, Jul 06 2004a(n) = a(n-3) + a(n-1). - _Graeme McRae_, Apr 26 2010From _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 21 2015 : (Start)a(n) = A097333(n-3), n >= 3.a(n) = A000930(n) - A000930(n-2), n >= 2. (End)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x^2)/(1 - x - x^3), {x, 0, 50}], x] (*and/or*) a=-1; b=1; c=1; lst={b,c}; Do[d=a+c; AppendTo[lst,d]; a=b; b=c; c=d,{n,5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 28 2010 *)LinearRecurrence[{1,0,1},{1,1,0},50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 03 2015 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 06 2000
extensions: Edited: Offset corrected to 0. The formula by P. Barry corrected. Old formulas adapted to new offset. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 21 2015
